newsitem.title: ROMANIA: ROMANIA LEU ENDS FLAT VS DLR IN LOW TRADING.
newsitem.headline: ROMANIA LEU ENDS FLAT VS DLR IN LOW TRADING.

text.p: 1445 GMT - The Romanian leu currency closed on Tuesday steady at 3,325/35 to the dollar after slipping slightly in early trading on an interbank market hit by hard currency squeezes.
* Operators said most intrabank deals had been struck in other currencies whose cross rates deliver weaker leu-dollar rates of about 3,700.
* Latest central bank data showed a $200,000 interbank volume on Monday, when overall trading was $10.1 million.
* Short-term money market rates stayed near 43 percent. -- Bucharest Newsroom 40-1 3120264
